solution_line_template: Two packs of basketball cards cost {num_basketball_packs} x ${cost_basketball_pack} = $<<{num_basketball_packs}*{cost_basketball_pack}={cost_basketball_cards}>>{cost_basketball_cards}.
Five decks of baseball cards cost {num_baseball_decks} x ${cost_baseball_deck}= $<<{num_baseball_decks}*{cost_baseball_deck}={cost_baseball_cards}>>{cost_baseball_cards}.
Thus, the total cost of the cards was ${cost_basketball_cards} + ${cost_baseball_cards} = $<<{cost_basketball_cards}+{cost_baseball_cards}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
